charter.name: Proveniq Ledger Product Charter
charter.purpose: Define the product boundaries, principles, and governance for Proveniq Ledger

in_scope: Immutable record of asset state transitions
AI-powered risk analysis and fraud detection

principles.name: Truth Over Convenience
principles.description: Never sacrifice data integrity for user experience

principles.name: Immutability First
principles.description: All records are append-only; history cannot be rewritten

principles.name: Verification Required
principles.description: No claim enters the ledger without verification

principles.name: Audit Everything
principles.description: Every action is logged and attributable

governance.change_control: All feature changes require Product Owner approval
